---
title: "Velocity in relation to distance from edge"
output: html_notebook
---

Looking at relationship between velocity and the Y axis

```{r}
load("C:\\Users\\nicoleh3\\Documents\\Post-doc\\Scripts\\Total Data Merged File.RData") 

library(ggplot2)
ind <- unique(TotalData$D_V_T)
length(ind)

str(TotalData)

for (i in 1:length(ind)){
plot(TotalData$v[TotalData$D_V_T==ind[i]],
     TotalData$Y[TotalData$D_V_T==ind[i]],
     xlab = "Velocity (m/s)",
     ylab = "Y Axis (cm)",
     main = "") 
}



```
